name: Gravitile
description:
Gravitile

A puzzle game centered around changing the direction of gravity.

The goal is to make your spaceship land on the stars.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys > Change Gravity
  • R key > Restart Level
  • Spacebar > Freeze / Thaw Water Meteors

Submission for Mini Jam 59: Fortress (but the theme is optional)
